name: webapp-think_board
description: This project will use the MERN stack which contains - **M - MongoDB:** A database that gives the app a place to store the data. - **E - Express:** A web framework to build web apps easier and faster. - **R - React:** A front end library. - **N - NodeJS:** A Javascript Runtime package that lets us run JS on a server.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
